embed.title: Meta
embed.description: Below is a list of troops that are strong in the current meta

fields.name: Range
fields.value:
Support for front line
Frost Archers, Taurus Witcher

fields.name: Tank
fields.value:
Front and back support
Meteor Golem, Stone Golem

fields.name: Crowd Control
fields.value:
Control enemy movement
Pumpkin Guard, Witchcraft Totem, Pirate Ship, Rhino Knight

fields.name: Bomb
fields.value:
High-power AoE
Ballista, Ice Mage, Priest Mage
